title: 【3.11.0.5修复更新】亮变暗，暗变亮，引擎升级修复忙，晚上再也不用当瞎子了！
author: Sakura小樱花
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Sakura小樱花 于 2015-6-28 12:15 编辑 

然而这里是一只樱花带来的翻译更新作者这是要日更的节奏
不过这次修复的内容非常赞，让我们看下去吧！

3.11.0.5更新内容~
公告-Nelson Sexton

哈喽【标准开头XD】

如果你对正在测试的Unturned感兴趣，你可以打开你的Steam游戏库右键点击Unturned，选择属性，找到“测试”栏，输入代码“OPERATIONMAPLELEAF”体验测试版的Unturned哟~

更新内容：

调整：
关闭玩家视野外的物体反射调整僵尸导航区域，僵尸能跑得更远了调小了太阳的大小

修复：
修复使用DX9的第一人称画面会变得超级亮的问题修复角色视图非常暗的问题【临时修复】修复地图信息栏非常暗的问题修复玩家角色外观非常暗的问题修复黑夜的光反射修复夜间照明配置修复树的反射设置修复NavMesh的能见度修复间隙处的阴影问题修复公路上的颠簸点



作者的话：


  如果你有时间能够参与这个调查协助我更好的了解如何过渡至Unity5引擎，我非常感激。
  http://strawpoll.me/4760497


原文如下：
Hello! 
 If you're interested in testing out this upcoming update head on over to the Preview branch! You can gain access by right clicking on Unturned in your Steam library, selecting properties, navigating to the Betas tab and entering the secret passcode "OPERATIONMAPLELEAF".   Tweaks: 
 Disabled reflections on objects as they looked out of place. 
 Tweaked loading area of navigation so zombies can roam a bit further.
 Tweaked sun size a bit smaller. 
Fixes:
 Fixed first person view super bright on DX9.
 Fixed character inspect screen brightness. [Temporary fix]
 Fixed information screen map brightness.
 Fixed player icons brightness.
 Fixed black skybox reflection.
 Fixed nighttime lighting configuration.
 Fixed reflective trees.
 Fixed navmesh visibility.
 Fixed gaps in shadows.
 Fixed bumpy spots in roads of PEI.
 If you have a moment I'd appreciate if you could check in with this poll so I can get a bit of an indicator as to how well the transition to Unity 5 is going: http://strawpoll.me/4760497 
 Thanks for reading!
